name: multi-provider-cli-chat
description: Route Claude prompts to Codex (OpenAI CLI) and Gemini CLI with account-based auth, rate-limit handling, and no direct API key usage.

commands.name: openai-cli
commands.title: Send prompt via Codex CLI
commands.description: Uses the locally installed @openai/codex CLI (`codex exec`) with your existing login/session.

prompt.description: User prompt to send to Codex CLI

model.description: Optional model override passed to Codex via -m/--model

commands.name: gemini-cli
commands.title: Send prompt via Gemini CLI
commands.description: Uses the locally installed gemini CLI with your existing login/session.

prompt.description: User prompt to send to Gemini CLI
